description: Russian reports say Chechnya's hardline leader, Ramzan Kadyrov, was flown to a hospital in Moscow.
title: Coronavirus: Chechnya's Ramzan Kadyrov 'flown to Moscow hospital'
title_page: Coronavirus: Chechnya's Ramzan Kadyrov 'flown to Moscow hospital' - BBC News
maintext: The government in Moscow says the outbreak nationally is stabilising. The daily rise in new cases has dropped in recent days. On Wednesday, the number of people discharged from hospital after recovery for the first time exceeded the number of new infections over the previous 24 hours.
